attributes.action: Block bonuses paid to the UK bankers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We have paid £20 billion to the UK banking industry to bail their failing companies out. They are proposing to pay 1 billion of that in bonuses to their staff who contributed to that failure. This is unacceptable!!! The government owns the banks and should stop payment of these bonuses. If you agree please sign this petition

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
